00003 tw_event        *
00004 rn_timer_simple(tw_lp * lp, tw_stime ts)
00005 {
00006         tw_event        *tmr;
00007         rn_lp_state     *state;
00008         rn_message      *r;
00009         rn_stream       *s;
00010 
00011         state = lp->cur_state;
00012         tmr = tw_event_new(lp->gid, ts, lp);
00013 
00014         r = tw_event_data(tmr);
00015         s = rn_getstream(lp);
00016 
00017         r->type = TIMER;
00018         r->dst = lp->id;
00019         r->src = lp->id;
00020         r->timer = state->cur_lp;
00021         r->size = s->cur_layer;
00022         r->port = s->port;
00023 
00024         tw_event_send(tmr);
00025 
00026         return tmr;
00027 }

00029 tw_event        *
00030 rn_timer_init(tw_lp * lp, tw_stime ts)
00031 {
00032         tw_event        *e;
00033         rn_lp_state     *state;
00034         rn_message      *msg;
00035         rn_stream       *s;
00036 
00037         e = tw_timer_init(lp, ts);
00038 
00039         if(!e)
00040                 return NULL;
00041 
00042         msg = tw_event_data(e);
00043         state = lp->cur_state;
00044         s = rn_getstream(lp);
00045 
00046         msg->type = TIMER;
00047         msg->timer = state->cur_lp;
00048         msg->src = lp->id;
00049         msg->dst = lp->id;
00050         msg->size = s->cur_layer;
00051         msg->port = s->port;
00052         msg->ttl = 0;
00053 
00054         return e;
00055 }
00056 
00057 tw_event        *
00058 rn_timer_reset(tw_lp * lp, tw_event ** e, tw_stime ts)
00059 {
00060         rn_message      *msg;
00061         rn_lp_state     *state;
00062 
00063         tw_timer_reset(lp, e, ts);
00064 
00065         if(!*e)
00066                 return *e;
00067 
00068         state = (rn_lp_state *) lp->cur_state;
00069         msg = (rn_message *) tw_event_data(*e);
00070 
00071         msg->type = TIMER;
00072         msg->timer = state->cur_lp;
00073         msg->src = lp->id;
00074         msg->dst = lp->id;
00075 
00076         return *e;
00077 }

00079 void
00080 rn_timer_cancel(tw_lp * lp, tw_event ** e)
00081 {
00082         tw_timer_cancel(lp, e);
00083         e = NULL;
